OOC: Hmmm. Let me rewrite that...

BIC: Atma, Psuedo, and Technosis leave. Deemos frantically looks for an
exit. Doom Ice and Horn Drill come along.

"We need to get out of here fast!" Deemos says. Doom Ice shows off her new
jetpacks and fire shields, as long as they got out far enough, the fire
might just put them into stasis lock. They all jetted towards the exit,
following Rizopas' trail. They carried all of the wounded. (Seeing as how
Alloran can't be on his computer, Serge picks up Sharpedge) And they make it
to the exit. OOC: Vulois is just killing himself for nothing on this one I
think. My only characters are not about to die...
----- Original Message -----
From: <minime_316@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 9:31 PM
Subject: Re: Death of an emissairy


> OOC: Uh, Soulstice, I don't think you quite understand how Vulois'
> base works. It's a huge mountain, and teh base and tunnels are deep
> in the center, and that's where we are. To get to the top you would
> have to dig for hours.
